org.micromanager.display

Interface DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DisplaySettings.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    DisplaySettings
    Deprecated. 
    Use DisplaySettings.Builder instead

    @Deprecated
public static interface DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder
extends DisplaySettings.Builder
    Deprecated version of a DisplaySettings Builder.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        @Deprecated
DisplaySettings build()
        Deprecated. 
        Construct a DisplaySettings from the DisplaySettingsBuilder. Call this once you are finished setting all DisplaySettings parameters.
        Specified by:
        build in interface DisplaySettings.Builder
        Returns:
        Build object

      • channelColors

        @Deprecated
DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder channelColors(java.awt.Color[] channelColors)
        Deprecated. 

      • safeUpdateChannelColor

        @Deprecated
DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder safeUpdateChannelColor(java.awt.Color newColor,
                                                                          int channelIndex)
        Deprecated. 
        "Safely" update the channelColors property to include the new provided color at the specified index. If the channelColors property is null or is not large enough to incorporate the specified index, then a new array will be created that is long enough, values will be copied across, and any missing values will be null.
        Parameters:
        newColor - New color for the specified channel.
        channelIndex - Index into the channelColors array.
        Returns:
        builder to be used to build the new DisplaySettings

      • channelContrastSettings

        @Deprecated
DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder channelContrastSettings(DisplaySettings.ContrastSettings[] contrastSettings)
        Deprecated. 

      • safeUpdateContrastSettings

        @Deprecated
DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder safeUpdateContrastSettings(DisplaySettings.ContrastSettings newSettings,
                                                                              int channelIndex)
        Deprecated. 
        "Safely" update the contrastSettings property to have the provided ContrastSettings object at the specified index. If the contrastSettings property is null or is not large enough to incorporate the specified index, then a new array will be created that is long enough, values will be copied across, and any missing values will be null.
        Parameters:
        newSettings - New ContrastSettings for the channel.
        channelIndex - Index into the contrastSettings array.
        Returns:
        builder to be used to build the new DisplaySettings
